name: freld
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wrel(c0))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(wf(c0, c1, c2), wrel(c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wrel(c0))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(wf(c0, c1, c2), wrel(c0))

|- wi(w0, wrel(c0))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, c2))

comment: A mapping is a relation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
